text: Magdalena Zeger (born circa 1491; died 16 January 1568) was a astrologer, astromoner, and a calendar maker. She was the first woman to independently publish research in astrology. == Personal life == Magdalena Zeger was born around 1491, according to her obituary (short text honoring her life) in Kolding, and died in 1568 at the age of 77. She was married to Thomas Zeger and then had a son called Thomas Zeger the II. == References == Category:1568 deaths Category:Astrologers Category:Astronomers Category:1491 births
title: Magdalena Zeger
